DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine effectiveness of a family meals intervention, Simple Suppers, aimed at eliciting positive changes in child dietary intake and weight status.
DOC.criteria: Caregivers: Primary food preparer in the home; responsible for at least one child 410 years of age; speak English as the primary language in the home; lived in the U.S. for at least one year. Family member: Following a restrictive or therapeutic diet.
